author: Riverside
title: Time Travellers
contents:
[Verse]
Em7  Em6            Cadd9     Em
      One day we'll find our way
          Am
Straying from the road
     Asus2  B7
We thought we could go
                Em
Until we would fade
 
Em7  Em6            Cadd9     Em
      One day we'll find our way
          Am
Straying from the road
     Asus2  B7
We thought we could go
                Em
Until we would fade
 
 
[Refrain]
Am                 Asus2 B7
Traveling across the fallen earth
        G       D         Am      Asus2
And the foreign lands, we survived
   C                            G
To believe that this is not the end
                D       Dsus2
This is not the time
 
Am                   Asus2
Moving unseen beyond
Em
The shadows waiting for
Am                         B
The birth of a star we can follow
 
 
[Verse]
Em7  Em6            Cadd9       Em
      One day we'll find our time
          Am
Come to realize
     Asus2  B7
That our history
             Em
Came full circle
 
 
[Refrain]
Am              Asus2   B7
Traveling across all the dried up seas
        G       D         Am       Asus2
And the foreign lands we survived
   C                            G
To believe that this is not the end
                D        Dsus2
This is not the time
 
Am                          Asus2
We crane our necks for youth
Em
We know we'll make it through
Am                         B
And we can go back to the forest
 
 
[Chorus]
         C
Let's go back to the world
         Em
That was 30 years ago
    G             D           C
And let's believe this is our time
         C
Let's go back to the world
         Em
That was 30 years ago
    G             D           C
And let's believe this is our time
         Am
Let's go back to the world
         Em
That was 30 years ago
    G             D           C
And let's believe this is our time
         Am
Let's go back to the world
         Em
That was 30 years ago
    G             D           C
And let's believe this is our time
 
 
[Instrumental]
Em7 Em6 Cadd9 Em Em Am Asus2 B7 Em Em x2
 
 
[Refrain]
Am              Asus2  B7
Traveling across all the dried up seas
        G       D         Am     Asus2
And the foreign lands we survived
   C                            G
To believe that this is not the end
                D        Dsus2
This is not the time
 
Am                          Asus2
We crane our necks for youth
Em
We know we'll make it through
Am                         B
And we can go back to the forest
